description: This file is a shell script designed for managing GRE tunnel interfaces, configuring syscalls, handling network bridge and interface setup, reading parameters from PSM database, and setting iptables rules for hotspot and GRE configurations.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes snooper sys-events by enabling circuit and remote snooping.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Reads hotspot GRE tunnel parameters from PSM database using psmcli.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Creates GRE tunnel interfaces, sets up bridge and VLAN subinterfaces.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Sets keepalive parameters for sys-events related to hotspot tunnel.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Configures iptables rules for bridge forwarding and NAT.
